titles.title: Designating majority membership on certain standing committees of the House.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/25/1995--Introduced. Elects the following Representatives to the following House Committees: (1) J. Dennis Hastert to Government Reform and Oversight; (2) John E. Ensign to Resources; (3) Steven C. LaTourette to Small Business; and (4) Nathan Deal to Commerce.
